name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
languages: Terran, one language of its creator's choice
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6)
text: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

description:
Earth Elemental Myrmidon. Elemental myrmidons are elementals conjured and bound by magic into ritually created suits of plate armor. In this form, they possess no recollection of their former existence as free elementals. They exist only to follow the commands of their creators.
Source: Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes p. 202, Princes of the Apocalypse p. 212
